info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 4:29PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Elkhart, northwestern Noble and western Lagrange Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 428 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Goshen, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph, pea size hail and heavy downpours. Road ponding and localized nuisance flooding possible. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Middlebury around 440 PM EDT. Topeka around 445 PM EDT. This includes Interstate 80 in Indiana near mile marker 110. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
